channel.title: Which one has a better internet browser??
channel.description: Which has a better internet browser (e.g. be able to view any webpage, and watch any video type online like DivX) Xbox 360 or PS3? I got a PS3 and i cant watch DivX movies online, go on facebook and other things like like that. Which is why im wondering if the Xbox 360 is any better.

item.title: Which one has a better internet browser??
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

Chrome is retarded for starting a new process for every tab. That’s all.

This this this, but Firefox beta locks up a good bit and when that happens I’d rather be using Chrome.

Chrome doesn’t crash entirely for me, not with 8 GB of RAM.

Read full topic
item.source: Which one has a better internet browser??

item.title: Which one has a better internet browser??
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
Strange. Chrome crashed twice for me in the several years that I’ve been using it, and both times were because of a ton of Flash advertisements in all of my tabs.

item.description:

item.source: Which one has a better internet browser??

item.title: Which one has a better internet browser??
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Most firefox crashes are due to bad plugins or low memory/corrupt cache, while chrome crashes because I open/close tabs too fast, and windows can’t handle it so the entire chrome interface crashes and doesn’t even remember the latest tabs that were open.

Read full topic
item.source: Which one has a better internet browser??

item.title: Which one has a better internet browser??
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
Maybe in some cases it doesn’t work, but in my experience running each tab in a separate process did prevent some catastrophic crashes due to adobe flash at times, but ymmv
there’s really no downside to that… even with the separate processes, chrome has a very low memory and performance footprint, so unless you’re OCD and can’t stand several identical processes in task manager it’s not a bad thing at all

Read full topic
item.source: Which one has a better internet browser??

item.title: Which one has a better internet browser??
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I do hate it when my browser crashes, but the thing with chrome, every single one of my tabs stop responding when one crashes, and I have to end task 200 times to get rid of it…

Read full topic
item.source: Which one has a better internet browser??

item.title: Which one has a better internet browser??
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
agreed. the good old fashioned way, when one page crashes and brings down all your other tabs with it, is sooo much better
also, any device without adobe flash sucks. and Apple electronics have very low prices

Y U NO ADBLOCK?

item.title: Which one has a better internet browser??
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
html5 youtube is laggy as hell on my pentium 4 mobile 1.6Ghz laptop, slows down firefox/chrome to a crawl, and the video can’t play for more than a few seconds, while flash works fine in up to 480p

notice how everyone wants to get rid of flash now that Apple has definitively refused to include it in their products
